name: Flap Dragon, Flap
description:
Flap Dragon, Flap

Made in a week for DINOJAM2 [8 Bits to Infinity] for which the theme was Volcano. 

How to play

- Flap to escape the big dragon through a volcanic tunnel
- Collect gems to get a high score

Controls

KeyboardGampadMouseFlapUp / SpaceLeft face buttonLeft-click

Credits

Programming by lilou_cormic (purplecable.ca)
